post.text: The question in this election: Who can put the plans into action that will make your life better?

comment.author: Kelsey
comment.text: Richard Sarabia: Lester Holt was the worst! Extremely biased! He slammed Trump but he couldn't slam Hillary in the same way. Why? His NBC boss told him if he did, he would be fired or replaced just like Brian Williams was and he's very familiar with that.

replies.author: Shelby
replies.text: because they are all sold out globalists, Kelsey

replies.author: Joseph
replies.text: Hating Hillary isn't ignorance....it's paying attention to ACTUAL history, not her revisionist version or whatever CNN and other pandering "journalists" force feed.
